name: Cannons, Catapults & Castles. Adventure On The Fragile, Floating Islands
name_original: Cannons, Catapults & Castles. Adventure On The Fragile, Floating Islands
description:
3D PLATFORM ADVENTURE AND BATTLE MODE IN 2PLAYER!!!

Try and DESTROY your opponents  playing field. Use Catapults and Cannons. Pickup and drop most objects. Be the last 1 to survive. Or test your skills in the practice mode.

Pro Tip...Be The First To the Top To Create The Cascading, Chain Effect.

(Made over the course) in Unreal Engine for the 2021 Unreal Engine Epic Mega Jam by Luke Lawrence (yoluke)

Models made in blender by Jon Adams (Spurgurgle)  and Luke Lawrence over the course of the Jam

2D Art made by Luke Lawrence

(For Learning materials on YouTube) Thanks to Devsquad, Mat Aspland, Dean Ashford and Lusiogenic

Music from Bensound.com

Sound FX from Mixkit.com

VFX from Infinity Blade
